title.rendered: ADLER Solar sets up UK office

content.rendered:
24 February 2016 – ADLER Solar, part of Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA, is set to open an office in London, UK, to ramp up its support level to the British solar industry.

ADLER Solar is a technical and engineering service provider for the solar industry. It offers technical and engineering services for the entire lifecycle of photovoltaic (PV) power plants and PV modules. The company is headquartered in Bremen, Germany, but its operating service teams and PV experts are engaged in projects all over Europe. In Japan, ADLER Solar has been operating a joint venture, ADLER Solar Works, with YKD since 2015.

“We have over the past year received an increasing amount of requests from the UK solar industry and we wish to springboard our global services through access to the London insurance market. Having a permanent office presence in London will enable us to provide even better on-the-ground support to both existing and potential clients in this market,” says Gerhard Cunze, CEO of ADLER Solar.

ADLER Solar’s clients include solar energy plant manufacturers and operators, insurance companies, PV experts, project planners, wholesalers, installers, investors and banks and energy providers.

In October last year, Oslo-listed energy consultancy group Aqualis ASA acquired a 49.9 percent ownership stake in ADLER Solar. ADLER Solar’s new London office will be co-located with fellow Aqualis-subsidiaries AqualisBraemar and Offshore Wind Consultants Ltd.

“One of our objectives following the acquisition was to utilize the Aqualis group’s widespread international presence to fast-track further global expansion for ADLER Solar without adding costs to our clients or us. ADLER Solar’s expansion into the UK is a good example of a successful execution of this plan,” says David Wells, CEO of Aqualis ASA.

ENDS

For further information, please contact:

Media
Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
tel: +47 41 61 06 05 | email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

Investors
Kim Boman, CFO, Aqualis ASA
tel: +47 959 63 912 | email: kim.boman@aqualis.no

About Aqualis ASA
Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public company that, through its subsidiaries, offers energy consultancy services to the oil and gas, wind and solar sectors globally. The group employs experienced consultants across 22 offices in 15 countries worldwide. Aqualis ASA operates under three different brands: AqualisBraemar, Offshore Wind Consultants and ADLER Solar. AqualisBraemar is a specialized offshore marine and engineering consultancy firm, focusing on the shallow and deep-water offshore segments of the oil and gas industry. Offshore Wind Consultants is a globally focused consultancy providing independent services to the offshore renewables industry. Adler Solar is a technical and engineering service provider for the global solar industry. Aqualis owns 49.9 percent of Adler Solar.
